page.title: 03EVENTS
page.content: On the school field we have an annual carnival.1985's carnival was on June 1st. and some of the stalls were run by the children from the school.One of the things there was a Fun Castle which is an inflated toy which you pay to bouce on.It costs 30p for ten minutes play on it.There was a welly_wagging game where people tried to throw wellington boots further than each other for a prize.The main attraction is the Carnival procession, when different clubs and societies enter a decorated lorry to join in the fun.The profit made goes to the school funds to buy more expensive equipment for the school.
